class RenewableDataLoaders[source]

RenewableDataLoaders(*loaders, path='.', device=None) :: DataLoaders

Basic wrapper around several DataLoaders.

                                      pre_procs=[FilterYear(year=2020), 
                                                 AddSeasonalFeatures(as_cont=False)],
